title: Research Topic: Truth Social SPAC Fraud Network
summary: Based on the research priority 'Truth Social SPAC Fraud Network', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Investigate Digital World Acquisition Corp SPAC fraud, Patrick Orlando, ARC Capital, and Chinese investor connections to Truth Social.... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
